title: Lambs' liver and kidney, with braised kale and crushed potatoes
description: Lambs' liver and kidney take centre stage in this dish. These cuts are packed with flavour and great value for money. Serve with kale and potatoes for a cheap gourmet meal.
ingredients: 300g/10½ oz kale, stemmed and chopped into 2.5cm/1in pieces, reserve a few leaves for garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
